question: I went to see my doc because I've been insanely tired and I meen a tired I've never felt before. She did tests for diabetes and a host of others. My tsh levels were high but I have normal t3 andt4. She wants me to come back in 3 months to retest, what should I do? I really am having trouble functioning. I'm so exausted. Let me know what you think Thank You
title: elevated tsh
